sense.name: A document giving official instruction or command.
sense.examples: The secretary handed her the authorization. We need an address to mail the authorization.

sense.name: The power or right to do something, or the official order giving this right.
sense.examples: Deputies are given authorization to issue warrants. Authorization for the program was renewed several times. Managers are often given authorization to fire employees.

sense.name: the act of conferring legality, sanction, or formal warrant.
sense.examples: The President gave authorization to the Department of Defense. The CEO gave me authorization to access the funds that afternoon.
